user_query: I want to organize a finance conference and hire professionals in New York City, know the current market clock, and suggest movies or series available for streaming in the US.

TaskList.description: Query available open positions in the finance sector in New York City.
Get the current market clock status.
Find popular movies or series available for streaming in the US along with their details.
Compile and format the movie or series details, including overview, streaming platforms, and audio options.
